channel.title: Men Called to Greatness on Thad Hughes - Errata
channel.description: Recent content in Men Called to Greatness on Thad Hughes - Errata

item.title: Meekness and Clemency
item.description: Meekness and Clemency Quotes from Scripture Matthew 11:27-30: “All things have been delivered to me by My Father; and no one knows the Son except the Father, and no one knows the Father except the Son, and any one to whom the Son chooses to reveal Him. Come to Me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take My yoke upon you and learn from Me; for I am meek and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
